mapper.select: select genre_name from genre join movie_genre on genre.genre_num = movie_genre.genre_num where movie_num = ${movieNum}
select genre_num from genre where genre_name = '${genreName}'

select movies.movie_num, movie_name,movie_country, movie_releasedate, movie_runningtime, movie_story, hashtag, cumulative_audience, movie_imgfile_name from movie_genre join movies on movie_genre.movie_num = movies.movie_num where genre_num = 0

select distinct g.genre_num, g.genre_name, (select count(mg.genre_num) from movie_genre mg where mg.genre_num = g.genre_num) as target_Num_Movies, (select count(ug.genre_num) from user_genre ug where ug.genre_num = g.genre_num) as num_Reg_Interest from genre g left join movie_genre mg on mg.genre_num = g.genre_num left join user_genre ug on ug.genre_num = g.genre_num order by g.genre_num
